name: retrieve_vectors
description: Retrieves information from a local vector storage system based on a query vector.

query_vector.description: The vector used to query the storage, represented as an array of numerical values.

items.description: A numerical component of the query vector.

top_k.description: The number of top results to return, ordered by similarity to the query vector.

index_name.description: The name of the index or storage where the vectors are stored.

filter.description: Optional filter criteria to narrow down the results. Key-value pairs where keys are field names and values are the criteria.

returns.name: results
returns.description: An array of objects containing the retrieved vectors. Each object includes 'id' (string, unique identifier), 'vector' (array of numbers), and 'similarity_score' (number) indicating the match quality.

exceptions.name: InvalidParameterException
exceptions.description: Thrown if the query_vector is not an array of numbers, or if top_k is not a positive integer.

exceptions.name: IndexNotFoundException
exceptions.description: Thrown if the specified index_name does not exist in the storage system.

exceptions.name: InvalidFilterException
exceptions.description: Thrown if the filter parameter is not a valid object or contains unsupported criteria.

name: search_vectors
description: Performs a similarity search on a local vector storage system to retrieve the most relevant vectors based on a query vector.

query_vector.description: The numerical vector used to query the storage system.

top_k.description: The number of nearest neighbors to return (default: 10).

filter.description: Optional key-value pairs to filter results by metadata attributes.

returns.name: results
returns.description: An array of objects containing 'id' (string), 'vector' (array), and 'distance' (number) for each matching result.

exceptions.name: InvalidQueryVectorError
exceptions.description: Thrown when the query_vector contains non-numeric values or invalid dimensions.

exceptions.name: StorageNotInitializedError
exceptions.description: Thrown when the vector storage system has not been properly initialized.

name: query_vector_database
description: Retrieves similar vectors from a local vector storage system based on a query vector and specified parameters.

query_vector.description: The numerical vector used to query similar entries in the vector database.

items.description: A numerical component of the query vector

database_name.description: Name of the vector database to query. Defaults to 'default_vector_db' if not provided.

top_k.description: Number of most similar vectors to return. Must be â‰¥1.

filter.description: Optional metadata filter to limit results (e.g., {"category": "product"}).

returns.name: results
returns.description: Array of objects containing retrieved vector data, similarity scores, and metadata. Each object has 'vector_id' (string), 'similarity_score' (number), and 'metadata' (object).

exceptions.name: InvalidVectorException
exceptions.description: Thrown if the query_vector contains non-numeric values or is empty.

exceptions.name: DatabaseNotFoundException
exceptions.description: Occurs when the specified database_name does not exist in the system.

exceptions.name: InvalidTopKException
exceptions.description: Raised when top_k is less than 1 or not an integer.

name: fetch_similar_vectors
description: Retrieves vectors similar to a query vector from a local vector storage system based on cosine similarity.

query_vector.description: The numerical vector to search against, represented as an array of numbers.

top_k.description: The maximum number of most similar vectors to return (default is 10 if omitted).

returns.name: results
returns.description: An array of matching vectors, each containing 'id' (string identifier), 'vector' (the retrieved numerical array), and 'distance' (a similarity score where lower is more similar).

exceptions.name: InvalidVectorFormatException
exceptions.description: The query_vector is invalid (e.g., empty, contains non-numeric values, or has incorrect dimensionality).
